abstract: Nova and Fister were strong in the regular season, but other pitchers may be more valuable in a deciding playoff game.
snippet: Nova and Fister were strong in the regular season, but other pitchers may be more valuable in a deciding playoff game.
lead_paragraph: Iván Nova finished fourth in the A.L. in wins this year. Doug Fister was fourth in the league in E.R.A. While the two pitchers facing off Thursday night aren't of the same caliber as C.C. Sabathia or Justin Verlander, most fans of both teams are probably cautiously confident in their number two playoff starters. They shouldn't be.

headline.main: In Yankees-Tigers Game 5, Best Pitchers Are Not Starting
